items.title: He wrote a song about not waiting. It’s the hold music at Social Security.
items.description: The story behind the surprisingly catchy hold music at Social Security that millions have heard – and plenty even love.

items.title: With golf, gold and deals, Japan’s new prime minister tries to charm Trump
items.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and President Donald Trump inked a rare-earth minerals deal ahead of Trump’s meeting with China’s Xi Jinping.

items.title: Callers to Social Security wait for hours to get help. Hear their ordeals.
items.description: Millions of seniors and disabled people call Social Security’s 1-800 number every month. What they experience is often maddening.

items.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.

items.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
